title: AS ORIKHIV DIRECTION RUSSIAN Army Shelled Poltavka, Rivne, Magic, Orikhiv, Five Diachal of Zaporizhzhia Region, General ...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Poltavka, Rivnopil, Charivne, Orikhiv, Pyatykhatky of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
